Name: 1st District
Description: The central district of Kallithea, known for its commercial hubs, shopping streets, and proximity to transportation.

Name: 2nd District
Description: A more residential district with parks, schools, and a strong community atmosphere.

Name: 3rd District
Description: A mixed area with both residential and commercial spaces, close to local amenities and cultural sites.

Name: 4th District
Description: A quieter area known for its residential housing, green spaces, and proximity to the sea.
